name: Chaos Runner (Rynder)
description:
You enter a world where your one goal is to run, jump and be fast. Speed run game that takes a trip through a possibly chaotic terrain. So chaotic you might not have full control over your character.

Made for: Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Try beat my current best time: 16:39. Comment your times below

Disclaimer: No where near complete, very simple and basic features.
